content: featured as skacel collection increase s 1 march 2017 crochet-along-together cat this pattern will be released over four weeks **march 2nd**- week 1 **march 9th** - week 2 **march 16th** - week 3 **march 23** - week 4 updates will be published at 12pm est easy as 1-2-3 is a three color cowl perfect for those looking to *learn how to crochet* the pattern features three of the most commonly used crochet stitches in an order that allows you to build your skills each stitch is worked in a different color creating eye catching blocks of color that also help you learn to read your stitches if you have been wanting to learn to crochet but are looking for more than just a plain design this pattern is for you **this design features ** * three colors of hikoo® simplicity * 1 skein each of your three favorite colors shown in colors 36 silver hair a 09 aqua mint b 10 deep turquoise c * written instructions charts and video tutorials which will be released during the cat * skills you will learn include how to work a chain single_crochet half_double_crochet and double_crochet how to whip stitch weave in ends read a crochet pattern and read a crochet chart finished dimensions 47 circumference 5 25 width feel free to stop over and introduce yourself at the skacel group 2 where the cat will be hosted be sure to add this project to your library to receive updates as they go live **please note the hook size for this project is 4mm us sizes vary from brand to brand just like sizes of pants from store to store while addi® calls a 4mm a us f other companies may call it something else as there is no us convention for sizing when in doubt always refer to the millimeter size ** 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/sources/skacel-collection-increase 2 http //www ravelry com/groups/skacel-collection-increase
